metadata.taskDesc: Dynamically Synthesize Agents and Orchestrate Information Passing
metadata.agentDesc: Dynamically Synthesize Agents and Orchestrate Information Passing

metadata.taskDesc: Retrieve the balance sheet data for United Airlines to analyze its debt structure.
metadata.agentDesc: A financial analyst specializes in analyzing financial data and providing insights on a company's financial health, particularly focusing on balance sheets and debt structures.

metadata.taskDesc: Retrieve the balance sheet data for Continental Airlines to analyze its debt structure.
metadata.agentDesc: A financial analyst specializes in analyzing financial data and providing insights on a company's financial health, particularly focusing on balance sheets and debt structures.

metadata.taskDesc: Based on the balance sheet data retrieved in task_1 and task_2, compare the debt structures of United and Continental Airlines.
metadata.agentDesc: A financial analyst will compare the debt structures of both airlines, focusing on liabilities, debt ratios, and overall financial leverage.

metadata.taskDesc: Retrieve the credit ratings of United Airlines prior to the merger.
metadata.agentDesc: A financial analyst will search for and interpret the credit ratings assigned to United Airlines before the merger.

metadata.taskDesc: Retrieve the credit ratings of Continental Airlines prior to the merger.
metadata.agentDesc: A financial analyst will search for and interpret the credit ratings assigned to Continental Airlines before the merger.

metadata.taskDesc: Based on the credit ratings retrieved in task_4 and task_5, assess the potential impact of the merger on the combined entity's credit rating.
metadata.agentDesc: A financial analyst will evaluate how the merger of United and Continental Airlines could affect the overall credit rating of the new entity, considering the combined debt and financial health.

metadata.taskDesc: Analyze how the merger affects the borrowing costs for the new entity based on the combined credit rating and market conditions.
metadata.agentDesc: A financial analyst will analyze the implications of the merger on borrowing costs, considering interest rates and credit ratings.
